title: Hidro Seventy Four
content:
Hi friend

please help me id the font used for Hidro Seventy Four

[http://hydro74.com/H74/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/lookbook.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170744/http:/hydro74.com/H74/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/2008/04/lookbook.jpg)

Thanks in advance

Hernando
author: hernando

comments.content: Which font? The logo is hand drawn. Consider [Skin Deep](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170744/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/blambot/skin-deep-bb/?refby=typographica) as a typeface alternative, but calligraphy is the best way to get that style.
I could have sworn I saw the logo font identified here, but I can't find it now. Given the duplicate characters (e, o, r), I think it's a font with some added swashes and an alternate y.
We had this before [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170744/http:/typophile.com/node/47677), but concluded it was custom.

Custom based on [Sloop](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170744/http:/fontbureau.com/fonts/Sloop/styles) again?

As spotted here: [http://www.typophile.com/node/48207](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417170744/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48207)
